message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd be interested in. I'm asking for $11,000 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $9,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to go down to $10,500.  This is still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested in this price.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
